Method Detail

setRatio

public void setRatio(double r)

getRatio

public double getRatio()

doPaint

public java.awt.Rectangle doPaint(int x,
                                  int y)
Uses the MersenneTwister to fill in a random amount of the area of the brush. Uses the formula: x % 101 <= 100*ratio where, 'x' is a random number, to determine if a specific tile should be painted or not

Specified by:
doPaint in interface Brush
Overrides:
doPaint in class ShapeBrush
Parameters:
x - The x-coordinate where the click occurred.
y - The y-coordinate where the click occurred.
Returns:
a Rectangle of the bounds of the area that was modified
See Also:
ShapeBrush.doPaint(int, int)
